channel.title: How do I add sprites to my sprites folder?
channel.description:
I have a sprite folder already, but only one sprite in it, my background sprite, it works, but it came with my client, so i want to add more sprites to it, I have tom's cache editor, but I'd rather use a sprites folder, may anyone tell me how to add more sprites to it?
This is what I think, dump the sprites out of my cache, and add to folder, is that correct, more to it, or wrong?
